body.name: Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with 5 Point Safety Harness, Canopy, Extra Basket, 2 Cup Holders, and Covered Compartment, Stormy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 9 hrs 54 mins.
features: Stroller offers versatile seating options for children, allowing them to sit in the front and rear seats of the stroller or stand on the rear platform
Equipped with a 5-point safety harness for maximum security and 2 panels fully ratcheting canopy on the front seat and fixed canopy with visor for sun protection
Single-hand compact hold with removable ear seat converts stroller to bench and standing mode for easy carry and storage; Folded (L x W x H): 22.63 x 34 x 16 inches
Features covered parent tray with 2 cup holders, covered compartments, and an extra-large basket for storage that is compatible with baby trend car seats (sold separately)

Minimum age for rear seat: 2.5 years; Maximum height rear seat: 40 inches; Maximum weight front seat: 40 pounds; Maximum weight rear seat: 50 Pounds; Dimensions (L x W x H): 22.63 x 49.25 x 43. inches
body.description: Get this Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with 5 Point Safety Harness, a versatile and practical stroller designed for families with two young children. This stroller offers multiple configurations, including sitting two children in seats, a younger child in a car seat, and an older child standing on the rear platform. The stroller is compatible with most infant car seats, making it a convenient option for families with newborns. Streamlined, single front wheels allow for an easy push and a more compact footprint. Your two children will stroll in quality, comfort, and style. The stroller combines maximum comfort and safety with a sleek style, making your trip accessible and enjoyable. Both seats have a 5-point safety harness for maximum security. The front seat has a removable 2 panel fully ratcheting canopy, and the rear seat has a fixed canopy with visors to block the sun. This stroller also includes a hassle-free one-hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your travel necessities, and a parent console with two cup holders and a covered compartment. Enjoy each trip with your children with the Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller.

This Stroller also includes a hassle free one-hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your travel necessities and a parent console with two cup holders and cell phone holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stroller for a budget.
reviews.reviewText: Great stroller. Easy to fold and unfold. Upper tray is a great feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It fell short as a deluxe item
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t have the quality or bells and whistles to be a deluxe item. I don’t have the baby trend car seat, so the front seat/ cup holder doesn’t hold/click my car seat in and it’s unsafe, I wish it had the short clips in the front, and I wish the car seat could be used in the back as a stand alone and not tip over. The wheels seem like a cheap plastic material, not heavy duty long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with my product with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: Overall, my wife and I like the stroller, but we were disappointed by a couple things.First and foremost, we were taken back to discover that the Baby Trend infant seat we purchased a few years ago for our first child doesn't fit securely in this stroller. It "fits" as in it does balance across a couple hard points, but it doesn't click securely into place, like it does on the one-seater Baby Trend stroller that we originally purchased with it. We had assumed that Baby Trend would make an extra effort to ensure the best consumer experience when using their products together; we were wrong. If we had known about this beforehand, we would have given other two-seater stroller brands greater consideration.The other thing that disappointed us is that the rear wheel breaks are plastic. They're not plastic-clad metal. The break locks and axel gears are plastic through and through. I'll be surprised if the stroller lasts more than a year without at least one of them breaking (no pun intended).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The rear seat does NOT fold down!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Terrible design when you have a newborn. Amazon should market PAID return more visable They owe that to their paying customers.Very disappointed in seller, manufacturer, description and Amazon.
